channel.title: “Open-Source” on Cult of Quality
channel.description: Recent content in “Open-Source” on Cult of Quality

item.title: “Liltag - a simple tag manager for your website”
item.description: “Liltag is a lightweight JavaScript tag manager that lets you dynamically load scripts on your website. Comprising just 250 lines of code, Liltag uses a JSON config to manage tags, works without cookies, doesn’t track your users, and is GDPR-compliant.”
